title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 411.6 - Psychology fee schedule
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 411.6 - Psychology fee schedule

State Regulations

The fee schedule for psychological treatment and care
rendered under the Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law shall be the
schedule of fees for psychological treatment and care under the Workers'
Compensation Law of the State of New York, as set forth in sections
333.1
and
333.2
of this Title, on the date
on which the psychological services were rendered, regardless of the date of
accident. This psychology fee schedule is applicable in accordance with section
333.1
of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
411.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
